item.title: CVE-2024-27992|2024-08-02T00:41:55.950Z -- link%20whisper -- link%20whisper%20free
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Link Whisper Link Whisper Free allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Link Whisper Free: from n/a through 0.6.8.
